description: Gets the status of a current calculation.

nested_items.name: SubmissionDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the calculation was submitted for processing.

nested_items.name: CompletionDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the calculation completed processing.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the calculation execution. A description of each state follows.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the calculation state change (for example, the calculation was canceled because the session was terminated).

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: Contains information about the DPU execution time and progress.

nested_items.name: DpuExecutionInMillis
nested_items.description: The data processing unit execution time in milliseconds for the calculation.
